name: Crystal Capture
description:
This is a work in progress my team and I are currently building as a final project. This is currently just one of our completed levels. The final game will have a hub world and 3 levels. It is a fantasy adventure game focusing on puzzles and platforming. There will be more story content added as the project progresses.

Team-

Design - Austin Michaud, Alec Nicholson

Code - Nicholas Martin, Austin Michaud

Art - Levi Elliot Smith, Jordan Little, Timmothy Tapia
